Installation

Prerequisites

Python >= 3.6

Latest release From PyPI

There is no release from PyPI

Latest revision from GitHub

Run the following command to install the latest version from GitHub.
For most environments, the "--process-dependency-links" option is
needed to install some of the dependencies from GitHub.:

   pip install --process-dependency-links git+git://github.com/paulflang/calc.git#egg=calc[all]

Setup

From the calc directory run.:

   python setup.py install
